fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: If someone complains about their night results last night, you can select them during the day to blackmail them for the rest of the day. You can also target dead players to remove their speaking permissions from dead chat but only if they complained about their night results. If you target someone who didn't complain about their night results then oops you're gonna mald at this one: you are immediately modkilled and lose the game. Loser. Dumbass.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Cause every criminal and evildoer to ragequit.
